article-meta.issue-title: Special Issue: Climate Change and the Emergence of New Organizational Landscapes

body.p: The Guest Editors would like to thank the following reviewers:

Liliana Andonova, Steffen Boehm, Katarina Buhr, Timo Busch, Peter Cebon, Peter Christoff, Jacqueline Corbett, Douglas Creed, Tina Dacin, Dror Etzion, Robert Falkner, Raghu Garud, Joel Gehman, Jean Pascal Gond, David Grant, Tobias Hahn, Nardia Haigh, Irene Henriques, Bob Hinings, Andrew J. Hoffman, Volker Hoffmann, Frank den Hond, Isabelle Huault, Charles Jones, Peter Karnoe, Younsung Kim, Hans Kjellberg, Janelle Knox Hayes, Tom Lawrence, Marc Le Menestrel, Bernard Leca, Lianne M. Lefsrud, Liang-Hung Lin, Sharon Livesey, Steve Maguire, Dirk Matten, Ian McGregor, Axel Michaelowa, Eamonn Molloy, Rasha Nasra, Peter Newell, Matthew Paterson, Charles Perrow, Nelson Phillips, Jonatan Pinkse, Alison Pullen, Steve Rayner, Sandra Rothenberg, Andreas Georg Scherer, Aarti Sharma, Jatinder Sidhu, Natalie Slawinski, Andrew Stirling, Johannes Stripple, Stefan Thomas, Paul Tracey, Bernhard Truffer, Paul Upham, Stacy VanDeveer, Gail Whiteman, Frank Wijen, and Christopher Wright.
